title: Social Comment Posted
description: Fires when a user posts a comment on a piece of content.

contentId.description: The unique identifier of the content being commented on.

contentType.description: The type of content being commented on.

commentId.description: The unique identifier of the newly created comment.

parentCommentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent comment if this is a reply.

isReply.description: Whether this comment is a reply to another comment.
